error.query.title: Server Error
error.smartTemplates.badRequest: The server could not understand the request due to malformed syntax. Please check the listed fields and try again.
error.smartTemplates.dateRangeExceedsLim: The range between 'initialDate' and 'finalDate' exceeds the permitted limit. Please adjust the dates and try again
error.smartTemplates.entityNotFound: No entity was found for the given ID. Please make sure to use the correct ID for the entity you are trying to manage.
error.smartTemplates.errorFileContentInv: The file content is invalid because it is not in the expected format. Please check the uploaded file.
error.smartTemplates.errorFileEmpty: The file you submitted is empty. Please check the uploaded file
error.smartTemplates.internalServerError: The server encountered an unexpected error. Please try again later or contact support.
error.smartTemplates.invalidDateFormat: The 'initialDate', 'finalDate', or both are in the incorrect format. Please use the 'yyyy-mm-dd' format and try again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidDateRange: Both 'initialDate' and 'finalDate' fields are required and must be in the 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. Please provide valid dates and try again
error.smartTemplates.invalidFileFormat: The uploaded file must be a `.tpl` file. Other formats are not supported.
error.smartTemplates.invalidFileUploaded: The file you submitted is invalid. Please check the uploaded file for errors.
error.smartTemplates.invalidFinalDate: The 'finalDate' cannot be earlier than the 'initialDate'. Please verify the dates and try again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidHeader: One or more header values are missing or incorrectly formatted. Please verify all required headers.
error.smartTemplates.invalidMapFields: The field on template file is invalid. Please check the field mappings in your template.
error.smartTemplates.invalidMetadataNest: The metadata object cannot contain nested values. Please ensure that the values are not nested and try again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidOutputFormat: The outputFormat field must be one of: `html`, `csv`, or `xml`.
error.smartTemplates.invalidPathParamete: Path parameters are in an incorrect format. Please check the parameters and ensure they meet the required format before trying again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidQueryParamet: One or more query parameters are in an incorrect format. Please check the parameters and ensure they meet the required format before trying again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidSortOrder: The 'sort_order' field must be 'asc' or 'desc'. Please provide a valid sort order and try again.
error.smartTemplates.invalidTemplateID: The specified templateID is not a valid UUID. Please check the value passed.
error.smartTemplates.metadataKeyLengthEx: The metadata key exceeds the maximum allowed length of characters. Please use a shorter value.
error.smartTemplates.metadataValueLength: The metadata value exceeds the maximum allowed length of characters. Please use a shorter value.
error.smartTemplates.missingFieldsInRequ: Your request is missing one or more required fields. Please refer to the documentation to ensure all necessary fields are included in your request.
error.smartTemplates.missingRequiredFiel: One or more required fields are missing. Please ensure all required fields like `description`, `template`, and `outputFormat` are included.
The fields mapped on template file are missing on tables schema. Please check the fields passed.
error.smartTemplates.missingSchemaTable: There is a schema table missing. Please check your template file passed.
error.smartTemplates.paginationLimitExce: The pagination limit exceeds the maximum allowed items per page. Please verify the limit and try again.
error.smartTemplates.reportNotFound: No report was found for the provided ID.
error.smartTemplates.reportStatusNotFini: The Report is not ready to download. Report is processing yet.
error.smartTemplates.unexpectedFieldsInR: The request body contains more fields than expected. Please send only the allowed fields as per the documentation. The unexpected fields are listed in the fields object.
error.smartTemplates.unknownError: Unknown error occurred in Smart Templates service.
error.smartTemplates.updateOutputFormatW: Can not update output format without passing template file. Please check information passed and try again.
errors.custom.one_lowercase_letter: Field must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
errors.custom.one_number: Field must contain at least 1 number
errors.custom.one_uppercase_letter: Field must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
errors.custom.special_characters: Field must not contain special characters
errors.custom.uppercase_required: Field must be in uppercase and consist of letters only
errors.report.values.invalid: Please provide valid values for the selected operator
errors.template.file.invalid_extension: File must be a .tpl template file
errors.template.file.too_large: File size must be less than 5MB
errors.too_big.date.inclusive: Date must be before or equal to {maximum}
errors.too_big.number.inclusive: Field must be less than or equal to {maximum}
errors.too_big.string.exact: Field must contain exactly {maximum} {maximum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}
errors.too_big.string.inclusive: Field must contain at most {maximum} {maximum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}
errors.too_big.string.not_inclusive: Field must contain under {maximum} {maximum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}
errors.too_small.date.inclusive: Date must be after or equal to {minimum}
errors.too_small.string.exact: Field must contain exactly {minimum} {minimum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}
errors.too_small.string.inclusive: Field must contain at least {minimum} {minimum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}
errors.too_small.string.not_inclusive: Field must contain over {minimum} {minimum, plural, =0 {characters} one {character} other {characters}}

reports.table.name: Name
reports.title: Reports
reports.tooltip: Reports are generated documents that transform your ledger data using templates. You can create reports for compliance, analytics, or data export purposes.
smartTemplates.about.description: Generate dynamic, data-driven reports using plain-text templates (.tpl). Smart Templates use simple placeholders to pull data directly from the database and renders reports in CSV, XML, HTML, or TXT, always matching the structure defined in the original file.
smartTemplates.about.title: About Smart Template
smartTemplates.cards.docs.description: Need help or additional documentation? We're here to help.
smartTemplates.cards.docs.title: Smart Template Docs
smartTemplates.cards.reports.description: Here are the reports, the output of data processing through templates.

templates.subtitle: Manage your report templates and their configurations.
templates.title: Templates
templates.tooltip: Templates are pre-configured report structures that help you standardize and automate how data is presented. You can define layouts, formats, and parameters to streamline report generation and ensure consistency.
